reviewText: Poor cource and it doesn't worth to learn for buyers with expeiance.Simply general information

There are never enough peer review opportunities available when I have completed my assignment and am ready to review others' assignments. As a result, I have to wait multiple days, sometimes even a full week in order to completed a course within this program.

Update...several days later, and still no peer review available. This program is dysfunctional and I would never recommend it to anyone. I would like a refund asap!

Interesting topic but the assignment is peer reviewed by three random people. For example my answer for question 3 two people gave me perfect and one person gave me a zero with no explanation. You need 80% overall from all 4 questions to pass.  I ended up with an overall 75% and there is nothing you can do but redo the assignment and hopefully you get three good markers or the process will happen over and over. I was planning on doing the specialization in this but once I encountered this problem I found a different online course from a different website that is all self test based that I prefer.
Upload options not clear or related to what is asked for
very engaging course on strategic sourcing.........a must take course for any procurement and sourcing professional.........
Important concepts done with relative examples
The course is really helpful. it gives you the basic knowledge of strategic sourcing. But as note, I think it would be better if provided some books references
Excelente Curso
This course is awesome and directly enhanced my work.
study at coursera has been a great opportunity for me gain more skills on how to choose a suitable supplier by source from the right supplier base
